articles.title: US ex-police officer Derek Chauvin sentenced to 22.5 years for George Floyd murder - CNA
articles.description: MINNEAPOLIS: Former policeman Derek Chauvin was sentenced to 22 and a half years in jail Friday (Jun 25) for murdering African American George Floyd, a killing that sparked America's biggest demonstrations for racial justice in decades.

articles.title: Excitement as Burna Boy, Diddy meet for first time - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Nigerian singer, Damini Ogulu, popularly known as Burna Boy, has finally met with American rapper and producer, Sean Combs, also known as Diddy.
articles.content:
Nigerian singer, Damini Ogulu, popularly known as Burna Boy, has finally met with American rapper and producer, Sean Combs, also known as Diddy.
